name: Vows and Peaks
description: Offers various Colorado elopement packages, including "Wilderness and Alpine elopement" packages starting at $4,700. They also have an all-inclusive package starting at $11,500

name: Simply Eloped
description: Provides elopement packages in Colorado destinations like Breckenridge, Colorado Springs, Denver, and Estes Park. They offer curated packages with vendors for photography, officiants, and more

name: Ceremonies With Lisa
description: Offers Colorado elopement packages focusing on intimate, easy, and stress-free experiences with breathtaking locations, photography, and officiant services

name: Colorado MicroWeddings
description: Specializes in all-inclusive small wedding and elopement packages (starting at $1,300) for up to 40 guests, including photography, videography, officiant, and planning services. They have over 300 five-star reviews

name: In Love and Adventure (ILA)
description: Offers elopement packages in Colorado with options for full-day and multi-day coverage, focusing on adventure and intimate experiences. They have a network of trusted vendors

name: Elevate Wedding Officiant
description: Provides personalized wedding ceremonies, elopements, and vow renewals in Colorado. They focus on crafting ceremonies that reflect the couple's love story

name: Lead Your Love Life
description: A wedding officiant business in Boulder, Colorado, offering celebrant and relationship coaching services

name: Matt Morgan Coaching
description: A wedding officiant and premarital coach based in Denver, Colorado, who has officiated over 1,500 weddings

name: Heartlight Ceremonies
description: Offers wedding officiant services to couples in Boulder, Colorado, with a focus on understanding and meeting the couple's needs for their special event

name: Michael Moody, Wedding Officiant
description: An ordained minister in Denver, Colorado, who crafts warm, personal, non-religious ceremonies for couples throughout Colorado
